short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share current tab, links, image URLs and selected text on WhatsApp Web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use its toolbar button, or the context menu (right click menu) option to share the current tab, links, image URLs, and selected text on WhatsApp Web. Keyboard shortcut Alt + W to share the current tab. 

Extension by BrowserNative. Not affiliated with or created by WhatsApp.

Visit homepage for more information: https://browsernative.com/whatsapp-web-share-button/
